de.javanarior.utils.lang

Class ByteCodeClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • de.javanarior.utils.lang.ByteCodeClassLoader

  • public final class ByteCodeClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
    Classloader to load bytecode directly from byte array. This classloader can be used to load classes from Java Compiler API which are compiled in memory or from other byte generating frameworks like asm. The ClassLoader follows the 'parent-first' delegation model .
